article_title: Strengthening the ‘hand-up’ approach in Gaston County Social Services
article_text:
By Earl Mathers

Posted May. 11, 2016 at 5:09 AM

article_metadata.description: Since 2009 the number of food stamp or SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program) recipients in Gaston County has increased by 75 percent. There is growing awareness that generational poverty is a serious problem in Gaston County and in North Carolina as a whole.Many factors contribute to the persistence of poverty in Gaston County and elsewhere.
